title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7823.5 - Reporting requirements of State agencies and public authorities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7823.5 - Reporting requirements of State agencies and public authorities

State Regulations
(a) Each State
agency which acquires a passenger automobile shall submit a copy of the
purchase order to the Office of General Services simultaneously with the
submission of the purchase order to the vendor of such automobile. (b) The Office of General Services and each
public authority shall submit a report to the State Energy Office, by September
30th of each year, containing the number of passenger automobiles acquired, by
model type, during the prior fiscal year by all State agencies and each public
authority, respectively, and the calculated average fuel economy for such
automobiles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7823.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
